# Palette's Journal

## 2024-10-25 - [WCF Service Documentation]
**Learning:** Backend services often lack "UI", but the Developer Experience (DX) *is* the UX. Swagger/OpenAPI is the interface.
**Action:** Always add `[Description]` and `[SwaggerWcfServiceInfo]` attributes to WCF services using SwaggerWcf to make the auto-generated documentation useful.
